string-array.name: notes_hints
string-array.item: Was the food delicious? Write it here and relive the memories!
Delicious, friendly staff, going back for sure!
Type in anything you\'d like to remember
I think the server spat in my food
The steak sucked. Remember it for next time.
The waitress gave me her phone number, it\'s ###-###-####
The food was a bit too pricey for the quality
I should have just stayed at home…
Good place to take a client from work
Write down the address, so you\'ll never forget!
